channel.title: Class01s on COM402 Advanced Web Design
channel.description: Recent content in Class01s on COM402 Advanced Web Design

item.title: Wednesday, January 18, 2017
item.description:
Wednesday, January 18, 2017

Welcome

We will be diving right in - a quick review of the syllabus and some of my expectations for the class, and then a chance for you to flex your coding muscles.

item.title: Lesson Plan
item.description:
1. Review Syllabus
  2. Review Grading and Attendance Policies
  3. Coding Challenge
  4. Homework Assignments

item.title: Code Challenge
item.description:
1. Create an HTML page using the text provided in this Gist.
  2. The page should look as close to the example provided by the teacher as you can.
  3. Feel free to use any resources or research you need and any method of building the page. I want to get an idea of how you would approach this challenge.

item.title: Homework
item.description:
Due Friday, Jan 20

  1. Sign up for a CodeCademy account
  2. Email Me (kpipe@sju.edu) with your answers to the following. There are no “correct” answers.
    • What is your name?
    • What do you prefer to be called?
    • What is the best email for me to get in touch with you?
    • Why are you taking this course?
    • What do you want to learn in this course?
    • Do you have a domain? What is it?
    • Do you have an example of a website that you have designed that you can share with me?
    • What do you consider “web design”?
    • Are you allergic to any foods (sometimes I make baked goods and I don’t want to accidentally poison you)?

Due Monday, Jan 24

  1. Brush up your HTML and CSS by completing the CodeCademy “About Me” lesson. (This might be a little basic but that’s OK, it will be a good review!) Email me when you have completed this. You should send me a link to your achievements page.
